summary_teim: Opening of the Rock Hall's first induction ceremony, including introductory speeches by Ahmet Ertegun and Jann Wenner and music by Paul Shaffer's band.
summary_ssm: Opening of the Rock Hall's first induction ceremony, including introductory speeches by Ahmet Ertegun and Jann Wenner and music by Paul Shaffer's band.
contents_teim: Special Events Director Bob Krasnow introduces Paul Shaffer and his band -- Krasnow introduces Ahmet Ertegun -- Ertegun speaks, introduces Jann Wenner -- Wenner speaks.

abstract_ssm: This is footage from the Rock & Roll Hall of Fame induction ceremony on January 23, 1986. Unnamed jazz band performs -- Bob Krasnow introduces Paul Shaffer and the band -- The band performs a medley of music by the inductees -- Bob Krasnow introduces Ahmet Ertegun -- Ahmet Ertegun speech -- Jann Wenner speech
